I ok this is a important note.

Looking that things are getting a little bo=
ring in NBW and In order to cheer this up, doing things more intersting and=
 concentrate in doing good posts instead a big amount of posts, Azure and I=
 were discusing some `points that will change this.

The point is as Azure =
said "the problem here is that the characters are alone. they don't have an=
y society with which they can interact. what I suggest is this: either chan=
ge the story by advancing 100 years in the future or change the place. what=
 should be done is that there could be a few cities, but not only Maximal C=
ity and Predacon City. There would be neutral ones also where shadowy deali=
ngs could be made"

Also NPC's chars are including in this idea that will c=
hange this RPG.

Question is that I  need to know who will post at least on=
ce a week, 'cause this will help to delevelop to this idea. This and the ne=
w plot will affect all chars involved in this RPG and will let a major inte=
racion among chars and result a major fun


:)

What do you think?
 
******=
******
*   Airly   *
***********
